title: ES6 - Set Default Parameters for Your Functions
content: In order to help us create more flexible functions, ES6 introduces default parameters for functions.
The console will display the string Hello John and Hello Anonymous.

The default parameter kicks in when the argument is not specified(it is undefined).As you can see in the example above, the parameter name will receive its default value Anonymous when you do not provide a value for the parameter. You can add default values for as many parameters as you want.

instruction: Modify the function increment by adding default parameters so that it will add 1 to number if value is not specified

hint: The result of increment(5, 2) should be 7.
The result of increment(5) should be 6.
